package.name: @choice-ui/form
package.description: Form components for Choiceform Design System

props.description: 过滤表单特定属性的工具函数

基础适配器组件
提供统一的表单字段布局和样式
Input 适配器 - 将 Input 组件适配到 Form 系统
Textarea 适配器 - 将 Textarea 组件适配到 Form 系统

props.name: variant
props.description: Visual style variant of the textarea.

props.name: allowNewline
props.description: Whether to allow newline characters when pressing Enter.

props.name: lineHeight
props.description: Line height in pixels for calculating textarea height.

props.name: padding
props.description: Padding in pixels (top/bottom) for calculating textarea height.
